type.name: org.gradle.process.ExecSpec
type.description: * Specified the options for executing some command.

method.name: args
method.description: * Adds arguments for the command to be executed. * * @param args args for the command * @return this

method.name: args
method.description: * Adds arguments for the command to be executed. * * @param args args for the command * @return this

method.name: commandLine
method.description: * Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments. * * @param args the command plus the args to be executed * @return this

method.name: commandLine
method.description: * Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments. * * @param args the command plus the args to be executed * @return this

method.name: getArgs
method.description: * Returns the arguments for the command to be executed. Defaults to an empty list.

method.name: setArgs
method.description: * Sets the arguments for the command to be executed. * * @param args args for the command * @return this

method.name: setCommandLine
method.description: * Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments. * * @param args the command plus the args to be executed

method.name: setCommandLine
method.description: * Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments. * * @param args the command plus the args to be executed

property.name: args
property.description: * Returns the arguments for the command to be executed. Defaults to an empty list.

property.name: commandLine
property.description: * Sets the full command line, including the executable to be executed plus its arguments. * * @param args the command plus the args to be executed
